content.raw:
That could explain some things.

Do we know what the cmake variable name would be once that `find_library` routine is finished? I don't think we're invoking it yet in any of our calls to `target_link_libraries`. I'm guessing that on Unix systems we're just getting lucky and some other Unix-only dependency is already linking to it, so we don't get this error on Linux or Mac.
content.html:
That could explain some things.

Do we know what the cmake variable name would be once that find_library routine is finished? I don't think we're invoking it yet in any of our calls to target_link_libraries. I'm guessing that on Unix systems we're just getting lucky and some other Unix-only dependency is already linking to it, so we don't get this error on Linux or Mac.
